description: This file contains the styles for the Tic Tac Toe application's frontend interface, defining layout, colors, and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling with centering and background color.

classes.name: game
classes.description: Styles for the game container including layout properties.

classes.name: game-status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the current status of the game.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Styles for the game board including padding and shadow.

classes.name: board-row
classes.description: Defines the layout for each row in the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for the individual squares of the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the button to reset the game.
